name: subjacent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
under or in a lower position : The consequences of a dam bursting are the flooding of subjacent land, and damage to buildings and roads. subjacent to This creates a new haematoma immediately subjacent to the original haematoma.
More examplesFewer examplesThe top layers provided a certain protection to the subjacent layers.This small pressure difference is enough to draw gases from subjacent soil into buildings via cracks in floors. The paper discusses the ecological significance of the large population of plants and animals in the sea ice and the immediately subjacent water.
